about.name: Miami
about.info_text: Miami, a vibrant city located on the southeastern coast of Florida, is known for its diverse culture, beautiful beaches, and lively nightlife. With a tropical climate, Miami offers a range of outdoor activities, including water sports, art deco architecture, and a culinary scene influenced by Latin and Caribbean flavors. The city is a popular destination for tourists seeking sun, fun, and a unique blend of cultures.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 454,000 (city), 6.2 million (metro)
State: Florida
Time Zone: Eastern Time Zone (UTC-05:00)
Languages: English, Spanish
Currency: United States Dollar (USD)
about.climate_text: Miami enjoys a tropical monsoon climate with a marked drier season in the winter. Summers are hot and humid, while winters are warm and dry, making it a year-round destination for visitors.

attractions_card.title: South Beach
attractions_card.description: South Beach is known for its iconic pastel-hued art deco buildings, beautiful sandy shores, and vibrant beachfront scene.

attractions_card.title: Art Deco Historic District
attractions_card.description: The Art Deco Historic District in Miami Beach features a concentration of art deco architecture, neon signs, and a lively atmosphere.

attractions_card.title: Wynwood Walls
attractions_card.description: Wynwood Walls is an open-air street art museum with vibrant murals and graffiti, showcasing the work of local and international artists.

attractions_card.title: Little Havana
attractions_card.description: Little Havana is a cultural neighborhood known for its Cuban influence, offering authentic cuisine, music, and art.

attractions_card.title: Vizcaya Museum and Gardens
attractions_card.description: Vizcaya is a historic Italian Renaissance-style villa and garden, providing a glimpse into Miami's past.

attractions_card.title: Everglades National Park
attractions_card.description: Everglades National Park is a unique natural wonder, home to diverse wildlife and ecosystems, including airboat tours for visitors.

attractions_card.title: Jungle Island
attractions_card.description: Jungle Island is an interactive zoological park where visitors can encounter exotic animals and enjoy shows and adventures.

attractions_card.title: Bayside Marketplace
attractions_card.description: Bayside Marketplace is a waterfront shopping and entertainment complex, offering dining, shopping, and live music.

food_card.title: Cuban Cuisine
food_card.description: Miami is renowned for its Cuban cuisine, with dishes like Cuban sandwiches, empanadas, and the classic Cuban coffee.

food_card.title: Seafood
food_card.description: Fresh seafood is a staple in Miami, with restaurants offering a variety of dishes like ceviche, stone crab claws, and grilled fish.

food_card.title: Latin American Flavors
food_card.description: Miami's culinary scene is influenced by Latin American flavors, with options from countries like Colombia, Argentina, and Venezuela.

food_card.title: Fruit Stands
food_card.description: Tropical fruits are abundant in Miami, and visitors can enjoy fresh fruit from roadside stands and local markets.

food_card.title: Cuban Coffee

hotels_card.title: Fontainebleau Miami Beach
hotels_card.description: The Fontainebleau is a luxurious oceanfront hotel with elegant rooms, multiple pools, a spa, and a vibrant nightlife scene.

hotels_card.title: The Biltmore Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Biltmore is a historic luxury hotel in Coral Gables, featuring a championship golf course, a spa, and opulent accommodations.

hotels_card.title: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne
hotels_card.description: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne offers a tranquil escape with beautiful beachfront views and upscale amenities.

hotels_card.title: Kimpton EPIC Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Kimpton EPIC Hotel in downtown Miami offers modern and stylish accommodations with a rooftop

hotels_card.title: Loews Miami Beach Hotel
hotels_card.description: Loews Miami Beach Hotel is a beachfront resort with ocean-view rooms, a spa, multiple restaurants, and easy access to South Beach.

hotels_card.title: Mandarin Oriental, Miami
hotels_card.description: The Mandarin Oriental in Miami offers a luxurious waterfront experience with elegant rooms, a spa, and stunning views of Biscayne Bay.

transport_card.title: Miami International Airport
transport_card.description: Miami International Airport (MIA) is the primary airport serving Miami and the surrounding areas, connecting to domestic and international destinations.

transport_card.title: Metrorail
transport_card.description: Miami's Metrorail provides a rapid transit system that connects the city and nearby neighborhoods, including the downtown area.

transport_card.title: Metromover
transport_card.description: The Metromover is a free people mover system that operates in downtown Miami, offering convenient transportation to key locations.

transport_card.title: Taxis and Ridesharing
transport_card.description: Taxis, Uber, and Lyft services are readily available for convenient transportation within Miami and its metropolitan area.

transport_card.title: Car Rentals
transport_card.description: Car rental agencies are easily accessible in Miami, providing flexibility for exploring the city and nearby attractions at your own pace.
